titleStmt.title: Rebells anathematized, and anatomized: or A satyricall salutation to the rabble of seditious, pestiferous pulpit-praters, with their brethren the weekly libellers, railers, and revilers, Mercurius Britannicus, with the rest of that sathanicall fraternity. / By John Taylor.
titleStmt.author: Taylor, John, 1580-1653.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
